00005 #ifndef EXAMPLES_TUMBLER_BASIC_MACROS_H_
00006 #define EXAMPLES_TUMBLER_BASIC_MACROS_H_
00007 
00008 // A macro to disallow the copy constructor and operator= functions
00009 // This should be used in the private: declarations for a class
00010 #define DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(TypeName) \
00011   TypeName(const TypeName&);               \
00012   void operator=(const TypeName&)
00013 
00014 // A macro to disallow all the implicit constructors, namely the
00015 // default constructor, copy constructor and operator= functions.
00016 //
00017 // This should be used in the private: declarations for a class
00018 // that wants to prevent anyone from instantiating it. This is
00019 // especially useful for classes containing only static methods.
00020 #define DISALLOW_IMPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS(TypeName) \
00021   TypeName();                                    \
00022   DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(TypeName)
00023 
00024 #endif  // EXAMPLES_TUMBLER_BASIC_MACROS_H_
